description: Although the transition from the ICD-9-CM to the ICD-10 version of MS-DRGs resulted in 1.68 percent of the patients being assigned to a different MS-DRG, payment increases and decreases due to the changes in MS-DRG assignment essentially netted out, resulting in a minimal impact on aggregate payments to hospitals...
title: Impact of the Transition to ICD-10 on Medicare Payment
